column1: * 1930 - The  University Press of Oxford sends J.R.R. Tolkien a copy of List of books in Tolkiens library#A Middle English Reader.
* 1932 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter to A.F. Colborn (27 May 1932).
* 1952 - J.R.R. Tolkien acts as host to the Oxford Dante Society.
* 1958 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter to Nancy Smith (27 May 1958).
** Arwen and Elrond leave Lothlórien on their way to Minas Tirith.Category:Datesfi:27. toukokuuta
